participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: A bit reserved but open to conversation, enjoys discussing food and family.
participant_1.background: i don't drink soda. i've a boyfriend. i live in a house. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Energetic and motivated, always looking to inspire others with a positive outlook.
participant_2.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i'm a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic.

content.text: Hello! You cannot imagine, how clean I eat
I am not athletic, but both of my parents were
